House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03355
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 1556, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌLIVESTOCK AND POULTRY FEEDS ACT OF 1956ꞌ
